title.rendered: Odisha FC are the new winners of Hero Super Cup 2023

content.rendered:
Odisha FC are the titleholders with a 2- 1 win over Bengaluru FC in the Hero Super Cup 2023. Odisha FC started the game with a forefoot, putting constant pressure on the BFC half. Diego Mauricio continued his good moment by scoring a free kick in the 23rd nanosecond of the game. They doubled their lead in the 37th nano-second of the game when Diego scored his alternate thing of the night. The game started with an effortlessly measured cross from Víctor Rodríguez, who entered Jerry’s title before being shot into the net by Diego.

(Read Also: AIFF committee meets for important issues including FIFA Congress, Futsal Asian Cup plans)

Odisha went into half-time with a comfortable 2- 0 lead. Odisha continued playing with no real trouble from Bengaluru. The Blues managed to score in the 85th nanosecond from Sunil Chhetri‘s penalty, but it turned out to be just a late consolation thing. The eventual titleholders went unbeaten throughout the event and became Hero Super Cup 2023 titleholders. Remarkably, Odisha FC had led by an Indian head trainer, Clifford Miranda.
